description: Creates and persists an Application resource.

parameters.name: ApplicationSourceConfig
parameters.description: The configuration for where the application should be loaded from. ExternalUrlConfig (dict) --- The external URL source for the application. The URL to access the application. ApprovedOrigins (list) --- Additional URLs to allow list if different than the access URL. (string) ---

nested_params.name: ExternalUrlConfig
nested_params.description: The external URL source for the application.

nested_params.name: AccessUrl
nested_params.description: The URL to access the application.

nested_params.name: ApprovedOrigins
nested_params.description: Additional URLs to allow list if different than the access URL.

parameters.name: Subscriptions
parameters.description: The events that the application subscribes. (dict) --- The configuration of an event that the application subscribes. The name of the subscription. Description (string) --- The description of the subscription.

parameters.name: Publications
parameters.description: The events that the application publishes. (dict) --- The configuration of an event that the application publishes. The name of the publication. The JSON schema of the publication event. Description (string) --- The description of the publication.

nested_params.name: Schema
nested_params.description: The JSON schema of the publication event.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: A unique, case-sensitive identifier that you provide to ensure the idempotency of the request. If not provided, the Amazon Web Services SDK populates this field. For more information about idempotency, see Making retries safe with idempotent APIs. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags used to organize, track, or control access for this resource. For example, { 'tags': {'key1':'value1', 'key2':'value2'} }. (string) --- (string) ---

parameters.name: Permissions
parameters.description: The configuration of events or requests that the application has access to. (string) --- The permission of an event or request that the application has access to.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Application.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the Application.
